CustomField.formula: CASE(StageName, "Qualified","Open", "Working On Quote","Open", "Quote Sent","Open", "Out For Signature","Open", "Awaiting Credit Approval","Open", "Identification","Open", "Conduct Due Diligence","Open", "Review Customer Requirements","Open", "Determine Solution","Open", "Develop/Review Pricing Model","Open", "Finance Review","Open", "Develop Proposal","Open", "Proposal Presentation","Open", "Solution Discussion and Negotiation","Open", "Contract Preparation and Negotiation","Open", "Financial Approval","Open", "Closed Won","Closed Won", "Deal Closure/Won","Closed Won", "Closed Lost","Closed Lost",NULL)
CustomField.label: Opportunity Stage
